Sass Website

Section A

As an Uchiha, Fugaku had very strong chakra. Even more, he was considered to be a rare genius, whose nickname of Wicked Eye Fugaku made shinobi of other nations tremble. His talents were considered comparable to Minato Namikaze and the Sannin, even viewed as a prime candidate to become Fourth Hokage.

Section B

As an Uchiha, Fugaku had very strong chakra. Even more, he was considered to be a rare genius, whose nickname of Wicked Eye Fugaku made shinobi of other nations tremble. His talents were considered comparable to Minato Namikaze and the Sannin, even viewed as a prime candidate to become Fourth Hokage.
